entries.title: Setting up a JSON Server
entries.content: We learned how to setup a JSON server and I can't wait to set it up on my daily journal.

entries.title: Broken Promises
entries.content: We learned how to build Promise chains to fetch data and wait for it to arrive before moving on to the next step with a chain of then() statements. Make sure you return your data with your Promise!

entries.title: Setting up a JSON Server
entries.content: We learned how to setup a JSON server and I can't wait to set it up on my daily journal.

entries.title: POSTing to the Database
entries.content: I learned how to POST to the database. Only took a million tries!

entries.title: Data Validation
entries.content: Testing out if my form validation for empty fields works.

entries.title: Post then Get
entries.content: Lets see if I can post and get in a single method.

entries.title: Modules!
entries.content: The Daily Journal now uses Browserify and all of the javascript is modularized. I can probably do some more work to clean them up. They got messy the last few rounds.
